meanings.definition: A building or structure used for smoking meat or fish.
meanings.sent1: The smokehouse in the backyard smelled delicious as the meat slowly cooked.
meanings.sent2: We visited the local smokehouse to buy some smoked salmon.
meanings.sent3: The smokehouse decided to have a barbecue party to celebrate its own existence.
meanings.sent4: The smokehouse stood tall like a guardian protecting the flavors within.
meanings.sent5: The smokehouse hummed with the savory scent of smoked ribs.

meanings.definition: The process of preserving food by exposing it to smoke.
meanings.sent1: Grandma learned the art of smokehouse from her ancestors to keep the meat fresh.
meanings.sent2: The smokehouse of olden times was a crucial method of food preservation.
meanings.sent3: The smokehouse was so good at its job, it even smoked the vegetables for fun.
meanings.sent4: The smokehouse transformed the raw meat into a flavorful delicacy through its magic.
meanings.sent5: The smokehouse enveloped the food in a smoky embrace, sealing in the taste.
